products.title: Harriet Vintage Curtain
products.metadescription: Harriet Vintage Curtain in Cream/Brown/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £24.42 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Harriet, a beautiful bird themed pattern bursting with colour at a great price.  
 
These multicoloured curtains are perfect to add a bird theme to any room in your home, the array of colours in the pattern means it will fit in with most decor.

products.title: Velvet Zest Yellow Curtain
products.metadescription: Velvet Zest Yellow Curtain. Made to measure from £24.42 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s.
 This soft curtain in Zest Yellow, adds a twist of colour to your home. A medium lemon-yellow shade with green undertones, this velvet yellow curtain creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this curtain made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our curtains are made to last. Our curtains come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service! 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1249 Fabric Colour: Zest Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

This fully lined fabric curtain is sure to add a touch of glamour to your interior and can be beautifully paired with a range of soft furnishings such as rich blues and greens to really bring the art deco flavour alive.

products.title: Aztec Ochre Yellow Curtain
products.metadescription: Aztec Ochre Yellow Curtain in Yellow. Made to measure from £29.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Inspired by indigenous tribal patterns from the South Americas, this 100% Cotton Aztec Ochre Yellow fabric uses a rustic warm-tone yellow shade on a neutral background to create these stunning curtains.  This fabric will compliment natural wooden tones within the home, but it can also be paired with dark navy or vibrant turquoise to create an on-trend colour clash. All our curtains are lovingly handmade within the UK. We are so proud of the finish and quality, all our curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with our FREE five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching roman!

products.title: Dragonfly Ochre Yellow Curtain
products.metadescription: Dragonfly Ochre Yellow Curtain in Yellow. Made to measure from £34.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. 
 
This Ochre Yellow Dragonfly curtain, in a bold and bright mustard yellow colour, is a trending mix made in heaven. Why not mix with teal, fuchsias and other 'jewel' tone fabrics in the room to create a modern cosy aura. 
 
Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this Dragonfly Ochre Yellow curtain is suitable. 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1210 Fabric Colour: Ochre Yellow Material: 90% Cotton 10% Linen Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes
